templates.template: GCP Cloud SQL PostgreSQL by HTTP
templates.name: GCP Cloud SQL PostgreSQL by HTTP
templates.description:
Get GCP Cloud SQL PostgreSQL instances monitoring with script item usage to perform HTTP requests to Google Cloud Platform Monitoring API.
This template will be automatically connected to discovered entities with all their required parameters pre-defined.

You can discuss this template or leave feedback on our forum https://www.zabbix.com/forum/zabbix-suggestions-and-feedback.


Generated by official Zabbix template tool "Templator"

items.name: Reserved CPU cores
items.description: Number of cores reserved for the database.

items.name: CPU usage time
items.description: Cumulative CPU usage time in seconds.

items.name: CPU utilization
items.description: Current CPU utilization represented as a percentage of the reserved CPU that is currently in use.

triggers.name: High CPU utilization
triggers.description: The CPU utilization is too high. The system might be slow to respond.

items.name: DB engine state
items.description: GCP Cloud SQL PostgreSQL DB Engine State.

triggers.expression: last(/GCP Cloud SQL PostgreSQL by HTTP/gcp.cloudsql.pgsql.db.state)=0
triggers.name: Database engine is down
triggers.description:
Database engine is down.
If an instance experiences unplanned (non-maintenance) downtime, the instance state will still be RUNNING, but the database engine state metric will report 0.

dependencies.name: Failed to get the instance state
dependencies.expression: last(/GCP Cloud SQL PostgreSQL by HTTP/gcp.cloudsql.pgsql.inst.state) = 10

dependencies.name: Instance is in failed state
dependencies.expression: last(/GCP Cloud SQL PostgreSQL by HTTP/gcp.cloudsql.pgsql.inst.state) = 5

dependencies.name: Instance is in maintenance
dependencies.expression: last(/GCP Cloud SQL PostgreSQL by HTTP/gcp.cloudsql.pgsql.inst.state) = 4

dependencies.name: Instance is in suspended state
dependencies.expression: last(/GCP Cloud SQL PostgreSQL by HTTP/gcp.cloudsql.pgsql.inst.state) = 1

dependencies.name: Instance is in unknown state
dependencies.expression: last(/GCP Cloud SQL PostgreSQL by HTTP/gcp.cloudsql.pgsql.inst.state) = 6

dependencies.name: Instance is stopped by the owner
dependencies.expression: last(/GCP Cloud SQL PostgreSQL by HTTP/gcp.cloudsql.pgsql.inst.state) = 2

items.name: Disk bytes used
items.description: Data utilization in bytes.

items.name: Disk size
items.description: Maximum data disk size in bytes.

items.name: Disk read I/O
items.description: Delta count of data disk read I/O operations.

items.name: Disk utilization
items.description:
The fraction of the disk quota that is currently in use. 
Shown as percentage.

triggers.expression: last(/GCP Cloud SQL PostgreSQL by HTTP/gcp.cloudsql.pgsql.disk.utilization) >= {$CLOUD_SQL.PGSQL.DISK.UTIL.CRIT}
triggers.name: Disk space is critically low
triggers.description: Critical utilization of the disk space.

triggers.expression: last(/GCP Cloud SQL PostgreSQL by HTTP/gcp.cloudsql.pgsql.disk.utilization) >= {$CLOUD_SQL.PGSQL.DISK.UTIL.WARN}
triggers.name: Disk space is low
triggers.description: High utilization of the storage space.

dependencies.name: Disk space is critically low
dependencies.expression: last(/GCP Cloud SQL PostgreSQL by HTTP/gcp.cloudsql.pgsql.disk.utilization) >= {$CLOUD_SQL.PGSQL.DISK.UTIL.CRIT}

items.name: Disk write I/O
items.description: Delta count of data disk write I/O operations.

items.name: Instance state
items.description: GCP Cloud SQL PostgreSQL Current instance state.

triggers.expression: last(/GCP Cloud SQL PostgreSQL by HTTP/gcp.cloudsql.pgsql.inst.state) = 10
triggers.name: Failed to get the instance state
triggers.description:
Failed to get the instance state. 
Check access permissions to GCP API or service account.

triggers.expression: last(/GCP Cloud SQL PostgreSQL by HTTP/gcp.cloudsql.pgsql.inst.state) = 5
triggers.name: Instance is in failed state
triggers.description: The instance creation failed, or an operation left the instance in an own bad state.

triggers.expression: last(/GCP Cloud SQL PostgreSQL by HTTP/gcp.cloudsql.pgsql.inst.state) = 4
triggers.name: Instance is in maintenance
triggers.description: The instance is down for maintenance.

triggers.expression: last(/GCP Cloud SQL PostgreSQL by HTTP/gcp.cloudsql.pgsql.inst.state) = 1
triggers.name: Instance is in suspended state
triggers.description:
The instance is in suspended state. 
It is not available, for example, due to problems with billing.

triggers.expression: last(/GCP Cloud SQL PostgreSQL by HTTP/gcp.cloudsql.pgsql.inst.state) = 6
triggers.name: Instance is in unknown state
triggers.description: The state of the instance is unknown.

triggers.expression: last(/GCP Cloud SQL PostgreSQL by HTTP/gcp.cloudsql.pgsql.inst.state) = 2
triggers.name: Instance is stopped by the owner
triggers.description:
The instance has been stopped by the owner. 
It is not currently running, but it's ready to be restarted.

items.name: Memory size
items.description: Maximum RAM size in bytes.

items.name: Memory used by DB engine
items.description:
Total RAM usage in bytes. 
This metric reports the RAM usage of the database process, including the buffer/cache.

items.name: Memory usage
items.description:
The RAM usage in bytes. 
This metric reports the RAM usage of the server, excluding the buffer/cache.

items.name: Memory utilization
items.description:
The fraction of the memory quota that is currently in use.
Shown as percentage.

triggers.name: High memory utilization
triggers.description: RAM utilization is too high. The system might be slow to respond.

items.name: Metrics get
items.description: PostgreSQL metrics data in raw format.

items.name: Network: Received bytes
items.description: Delta count of bytes received through the network.

items.name: Network: Sent bytes
items.description: Delta count of bytes sent through the network.

items.name: Connections
items.description:
The number of the connections to the Cloud SQL PostgreSQL instance.
Includes connections to the system databases, which aren't visible by default.

items.name: Oldest prepared transaction age
items.description:
Age of the oldest prepared transaction yet to be vacuumed in the Cloud SQL PostgreSQL instance, measured in number of transactions that have happened since the oldest transaction.
Empty value when there is no such transaction type.

items.name: Oldest replica transaction age
items.description:
Age of the oldest replica transaction yet to be vacuumed in the Cloud SQL PostgreSQL instance, measured in number of transactions that have happened since the oldest transaction.
Empty value when there is no such transaction type.

items.name: Oldest replication slot transaction age
items.description:
Age of the oldest replication slot transaction yet to be vacuumed in the Cloud SQL PostgreSQL instance, measured in number of transactions that have happened since the oldest transaction.
Empty value when there is no such transaction type.

items.name: Oldest running transaction age
items.description:
Age of the oldest running transaction yet to be vacuumed in the Cloud SQL PostgreSQL instance, measured in number of transactions that have happened since the oldest transaction.
Empty value when there is no such transaction type.

items.name: Data written to temporary
items.description: Total data size (in bytes) written to temporary files by the queries.

items.name: Temporary files used for writing data
items.description: Total number of temporary files used for writing data while performing algorithms such as join and sort.

items.name: Assigned transactions
items.description: Delta count of assigned transaction IDs.

items.name: Frozen transactions
items.description: Delta count of frozen transaction IDs.

items.name: Transaction ID utilization
items.description: Current utilization represented as a percentage of transaction IDs consumed by the Cloud SQL PostgreSQL instance.

discovery_rules.name: GCP Cloud SQL PostgreSQL: Databases discovery
discovery_rules.description: Databases discovery for the particular PostgreSQL instance.

item_prototypes.name: Database [{#PGSQL.DB.NAME}]: Buffer cache blocks read.
item_prototypes.description: Number of buffer cache blocks read by the [{#PGSQL.DB.NAME}] database.

item_prototypes.name: Database [{#PGSQL.DB.NAME}]: Disk blocks read.
item_prototypes.description: Number of disk blocks read by the [{#PGSQL.DB.NAME}] database.

item_prototypes.name: Database [{#PGSQL.DB.NAME}]: Metrics raw
Database [{#PGSQL.DB.NAME}]: Deadlocks count
item_prototypes.description: Number of deadlocks detected in the [{#PGSQL.DB.NAME}] database.

item_prototypes.name: Database [{#PGSQL.DB.NAME}]: Committed transactions
item_prototypes.description: Delta count of number of committed transactions to the [{#PGSQL.DB.NAME}] database.

item_prototypes.name: Database [{#PGSQL.DB.NAME}]: Rolled-back transactions
item_prototypes.description: Delta count of number of rolled-back transactions in the [{#PGSQL.DB.NAME}] database.

item_prototypes.name: Database [{#PGSQL.DB.NAME}]: Tuples fetched
item_prototypes.description: Total number of rows fetched as a result of queries to the [{#PGSQL.DB.NAME}] database.

item_prototypes.name: Database [{#PGSQL.DB.NAME}]: Deleted rows processed
item_prototypes.description: Number of tuples(rows) processed for delete operations for the database with the name [{#PGSQL.DB.NAME}].

item_prototypes.name: Database [{#PGSQL.DB.NAME}]: Inserted rows processed.
item_prototypes.description: Number of tuples(rows) processed for insert operations for the database with the name [{#PGSQL.DB.NAME}].

item_prototypes.name: Database [{#PGSQL.DB.NAME}]: Updated rows processed
item_prototypes.description: Number of tuples(rows) processed for update operations for the database with the name [{#PGSQL.DB.NAME}].

item_prototypes.name: Database [{#PGSQL.DB.NAME}]: Tuples returned
item_prototypes.description: Total number of rows scanned while processing the queries of the [{#PGSQL.DB.NAME}] database.

item_prototypes.name: Database [{#PGSQL.DB.NAME}]: Dead tuples
item_prototypes.description: Number of live tuples(rows) in the [{#PGSQL.DB.NAME}] database.

item_prototypes.name: Database [{#PGSQL.DB.NAME}]: Live tuples
item_prototypes.description: Number of live tuples(rows) in the [{#PGSQL.DB.NAME}] database.

graph_prototypes.name: GCP Cloud SQL PostgreSQL: Database [{#PGSQL.DB.NAME}]: Tuples

macros.description: GCP Cloud SQL PostgreSQL instance CPU usage threshold.

The filter to include GCP Cloud SQL PostgreSQL databases by namespace.
The filter to exclude GCP Cloud SQL PostgreSQL databases by namespace.
A response timeout for an API.
Sets HTTP proxy value. If this macro is empty then no proxy is used.

Time interval for the data requests.
Supported usage type:
1. The default update interval for most of the items.
2. The minimal time window for the data requested in the Monitoring Query Language REST API request.
